R packages
```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

Data pull

```{r}
adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")
adae
```


ggplot2
```{r}

ggplot(adae) +
 aes(x = SEX, fill = AESEV) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 theme_minimal()

```


interactive viz
```{r}

dv1 <- ggplot(adae) +
 aes(x = SEX, fill = AESEV) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv1)

```
